irgroupproject.tbn
Class Searcher

java.lang.Object
  java.rmi.server.RemoteObject
      java.rmi.server.RemoteServer
          java.rmi.server.UnicastRemoteObject
              irgroupproject.tbn.Searcher
All Implemented Interfaces:
SearcherInterface, java.io.Serializable, java.rmi.Remote
public class Searcher
extends java.rmi.server.UnicastRemoteObject
implements SearcherInterface

RMI interface provided for clients to query our TBN

Allows remote objects to directly query our TBN for a given Concept and Relationship type. We have chosen this method to create a distributed system and also, provide the framework within which brokering and partitioning could be implemented by simply passing on the request once it hits the interface.

See Constants for Server port values.

Author:
kurtisthompson

Method Detail

getConceptsByRelationship

public java.util.Set<java.lang.String> getConceptsByRelationship(Concept x,
                                                                 Relationship r)
Actual search method. Searches our TBN for expansion terms related to a Concept and having a Relationship type as specified.

Specified by:
getConceptsByRelationship in interface SearcherInterface
Parameters:
x - Concept to find related terms for.
y - Relationship type of relationships to search for.
Returns:
Set of matching expansion terms.
